posts.post_title: SOLD!! SGC 70 Bill Dahlen (Brooklyn) Looks like an 80
posts.post_content:
Super looking card of the tougher Brooklyn variation. This card looks like a 6 with great corners and color. Pay-pal gift, M.O. Check. If you want to use regular pay-pal please add 3% for fees. Not looking for trades.
